00026 bool_t Svcauth_gss_tab_creds_alloc( void )
00027 {
00028         unsigned int i = 0  ;
00029 
00030         if( ( TabAuthData = (struct Svc_rpc_gss_data **)mem_alloc( FD_SETSIZE * sizeof( SVCAUTH ** ) ) ) == NULL )
00031                 return FALSE ;
00032 
00033         for( i = 0 ; i < FD_SETSIZE ; i++ )
00034                 TabAuthData[i] = NULL ;
00035         return TRUE ;
00036 } /* Svcauth_gss_tab_creds_alloc */
00037 
00038 bool_t Svcauth_gss_tab_creds_free( int sock )

00041         return TRUE ;
